actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law

official_title: To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to permit the entry as immediate relatives of spouses, children, and parents of persons who died a service-connected death while on active duty in the Armed Forces of the United States.

summary.text: Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide immediate relative status to spouses, children, and parents of certain aliens who died while on active duty in the U.S. armed forces.

titles.title: To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to permit the entry as immediate relatives of spouses, children, and parents of persons who died a service-connected death while on active duty in the Armed Forces of the United States.
